item.title: Wall Mounted Hump RANS Modelling Validation
About
item.description: A Brief IntroductionHi, I’m Myren (image) Hi, I’m Myren Rajh and I am a Mechanical Engineer with a passion for Computational Mechanics, Finite Element Analysis (FEM), Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), Optimisation and Deep Learning. I am currently completing my Master’s Degree in Mechanical Engineering at the University of Pretoria with a research focus on Learning Discrete Numerical Differential Operators from Data. Prior to my current studies, I completed both a Honours and Undergraduate Degree in Mechanical Engineering where I focused my modules to specialise in
